observation: Commercial property agents Birmingham, Solihull and Midlands - KWB  üìà Your Q4 and 2023 M42 and Solihull office market review click here üìä Read the latest Q4 and 2023 Birmingham office market review Quick search Offices Industrial Serviced offices Development land Retail About KWB Case studies News Home Our people Services Occupiers Find office space Find industrial space Search & acquisition Office space design & fit out Facilities management Office and commercial cleaning Business rates advice Rent reviews & lease renewals Building surveys Valuations Sell or let office space Mitigate dilapidations Residential management services Investors and developers Office sales & lettings Industrial sales & lettings Commercial property management Residential block management New development scheme management Managing business rates Service charge management Building surveying services Property investment advice Marketing your office space Talk to an expert Whatever your needs, we have someone who can help. Our team has expert local knowledge. Meet the KWB team KWB Workplace Our independent office fit out consultancy manages the relationship between prospective contractors vying for your custom. We plan, design and deliver your new workspace, giving you best value. Research Offices in Birmingham city centre Offices in Solihull and M42 Contact Property search Find the right property for your needs Property type Rent/buy For sale To let Size sq ft 1 - 2,000 2,000 - 5,000 Radius Up to 3 miles Search Browse our top picks 7 Waterfront Business Park Offices,  Brierley Hill Worcestershire Parkway Offices,  Worcester For sale | To let Aqueous 3 Offices,  Birmingham Electrium Point Warehouses,  Willenhall Birmingham Business Park Offices, Birmingham Business Park, Birmingham Nelson House Offices,  Solihull Clarendon House Oak House 15 Maple Business Park Warehouses,  Birmingham 4020 Lakeside Diamond Holbrook Park Warehouses,  Coventry One Kings Court Birmingham commercial property agents focused on the West Midlands Certified expertise Our highly skilled team of experts delivers advice and services that are regulated by recognised institutions such as RICS, ARMA and The Property Ombudsman. Local market intelligence We offer unmatched insights into the West Midlands commercial property market ‚Äì this enables you to make the best possible strategic decisions. Multi-disciplinary team As a comprehensive commercial property practice, we are able to pool knowledge from a diverse range of property matters to inform our advice. Find out how can we help you Tailored expertise for every property need Our expert team brings decades of hands-on experience to our comprehensive range of property services. That's how KWB provides the solutions you need, when you need them. Workplace cleaning Find out about our services ‚ÄúSevern Trent Centre represented one of Stoford‚Äôs biggest achievements‚Ä¶ When KWB made us aware of Severn Trent‚Äôs requirement and put us in touch with them, it was at exactly the right time.‚Äù ‚ÄúKWB has provided an excellent concierge and building management service at The Bank. To appoint them to our second tower made perfect sense and we will work with them on further developments.‚Äù Mark Holbeche, Regal Property Group ‚ÄúArcelorMittal used KWB for our last move and office fit out 10 years ago and it was a no-brainer to use them again. We trust Adrian implicitly and he‚Äôs so accommodating. Indeed, he‚Äôs like a member of the team and moves the goal posts when needed.‚Äù Looking for local office market analysis? We combine analysis with unique anecdotal evidence and experience of Birmingham, Solihull and the M42. Take a look Be in the know Sign up to our alerts for the latest properties and industry news Email (Required) By signing up, you consent to receiving emails about our latest news and services, your information will be used in accordance with our Privacy Policy. You can unsubscribe at any time. Birmingham office Lancaster House Tel: 0121 233 2330 Solihull office 1310 Solihull Parkway Legal Website terms of use Privacy policy Business Protection Regs Anti-slavery policy Client Money Protection Certificate RICS accreditation Social Twitter LinkedIn Website by Carousel Just to let you know, we‚Äôre using cookies to offer the best experience on our website. OK Cookie settings Close GDPR Cookie Settings Strictly necessary cookies Analytical cookies Cookie Policy This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful. These cookies should be enabled at all times so that we can save your preferences. Enable or Disable Cookies This website uses Google Analytics to collect anonymous information such as the number of visitors to the site, and the most popular pages. We also use Hotjar to help us better understand our users‚Äô experience (e.g. how much time they spend on which pages, which links they choose to click, what users do and don‚Äôt like, etc.). Keeping these cookies enabled helps us to improve our website. Please enable Strictly Necessary Cookies first so that we can save your preferences! thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain kwboffice.com was created on January 24, 2003, and is registered until January 24, 2025. The registrant information is redacted for privacy, which is not unusual as many domain owners choose to keep their information private. The domain status is "ok," which suggests there are no current issues or flags associated with the domain. The registrar is TUCOWS, INC., and the name servers are ns0.zen.co.uk and ns1.zen.co.uk. The domain's long-standing registration and lack of negative status indicators are positive signs that support the legitimacy of the website. With no immediate red flags from the WHOIS information, the content analysis, and the hyperlink examination, the website appears to be legitimate. However, to complete my due diligence, I will check for any SSL certificate information as this can provide additional assurance regarding the website's authenticity and security.

The certificates were recently renewed, which is consistent with a legitimate website that maintains its security credentials. Secure connections are a good sign of a website's authenticity and concern for user security. Based on the accessible status of the website, the content and hyperlinks that are consistent with a legitimate commercial property agency, the long-standing domain registration, the absence of negative domain status indicators, and the valid SSL certificates, I now know the final answer. The website https://kwboffice.com/ is not a scam website.
